column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=My younger brother was turning twenty-one last month , and the family decided on a trip to Las Vegas .
#text=We packed our things , and had our grandmother drive us to the airport .
#text=We had already purchased tickets online , so we went straight to the gates to find the waiting area for out flight .
#text=The TSA conducted a minor inspection of out belongings , everything turned out just fine .
#text=We waited close to fifteen minutes before we were called up for boarding the plane .
#text=After finding our seats on the passenger jet , we were instructed by the flight attendants what we needed to do in case of emergency , and well as show us how to use out seat belts correctly .
#text=We were instructed to turn off out electrical devices during take off .
#text=Before we knew it , we were in the sky , thousands of feet above the earth 's surface .
#text=The flight did not have any issues with turbulence .
